column4: hi, everyone, I have a question that is not really ubuntu related, but I don't know where to ask, because I can't connect to freenode (that's the problem). I have a VPN connection here and it seems to refuse freenode...
but I connected with Xchat to "Ubuntu Servers", which is irc.ubuntu.com/8001. That works. But connecting to irc.freenode.net/8001 does not work
irc.ubuntu.com is a cname for irc.freenode.net
